description: For decades organizations have been managing people as an enabler to deliver a business strategy. Today, this is no longer enough. 'People' is strategy. Getting your people right means the difference in winning or losing in the current business landscape. 'People' is the key to understanding how value can be created and, more importantly, appropriated. Moreover, this is not simply an HR responsibility. Leading organizations manage people with the same rigor that they use to manage financial performance. This course develops students’ ability to evaluate, design, and execute a firm’s strategy by analyzing the people factors essential to sustained success.
title: People Strategy
